projects.title: GRPO Training on GSM-8k
projects.description: Developed a training framework for GSM-8k using GRPO techniques. This project is hosted on GitHub and provides a comprehensive guide for training models on GSM-8k datasets.

projects.title: Enefit Competition on Kaggle
projects.description: Participated in the Enefit competition on Kaggle and achieved a bronze medal. The project involves data analysis and model building for energy consumption forecasting.

projects.title: CRISP-DL Read
projects.description: Delivered two talks on the paper Control Net and Moma. This project includes resources and insights from the talks, focusing on deep learning advancements.

projects.title: Portfolio Allocation via Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed a deep learning model for portfolio allocation. This project explores the use of neural networks in financial portfolio management.

projects.title: Portfolio Clustering Baselines
projects.description: Implemented baseline models for portfolio clustering using deep learning techniques. This project provides a foundation for further research in financial clustering.
